title: The Politics of the New Child Tax Credit Payments
description: Robert Rector from the conservative Heritage Foundation and Lorena Roque from the liberal Center for American Progress discuss the increases that have been made and are proposed for the Child Tax Credit, moderated by MarketWatch's Victor Reklaitis.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Robert Rector from the conservative Heritage Foundation and Lorena Roque from the liberal Center for American Progress discuss the increases that have been made and are proposed for the Child Tax Credit, moderated by MarketWatch's Victor Reklaitis.
